intro.dialog_rand1: This Unit has something to show you.
intro.dialog_rand2: This Unit wants to help you.
intro.dialog_rand3: Do you want to copy your gifts?

intro.dialog: This Unit has constructed a |C3|Gift Duplicator|C0| device!
Please allow This Unit to scan your gifts.
This Unit has scanned a blueprint of all your gifts.
But they need a lot of power to generate.
This Unit can convert any matter into energy, but it helps if it can |C3|conduct electricity.|C0|

comment_trade.dialog: This Unit can create one copy with each gift blueprint.

comment_active.dialog: This Unit can convert gifts into energy.

comment_quick.dialog: A |C3|Spark Tonic|C0| can generate a lot of power if you have one.

comment_leave.dialog: This Unit will miss you when you leave.

comment_closed.dialog: All your gifts have been duplicated.

comment_give_limit.dialog: This Unit can't convert any more gifts into energy right now.

comment_take_normal.dialog: This Unit can duplicate this gift for you!

comment_take_unknown.dialog: That is very strange.|L|Your memories of this can't be analyzed, but you should know what it is.

comment_no_multi.dialog: |shake||C3|No additional effect detected!|C0||norm||L|This Unit would not recommend duplicating this gift, unless you lost the original.

comment_burden.dialog: This Unit fails to compute why you would want more of that.

comment_take_over.dialog: This Unit requires more power to duplicate this gift.

comment_quick_limit.dialog: You would not have room to carry this.

gift_taken.dialog_rand1: Hopefully this effect can stack in a helpful way.
gift_taken.dialog_rand2: Let This Unit know if the effects combine well.
gift_taken.dialog_rand3: Will the effect be doubled or was this a waste of power?
gift_taken.dialog_rand4: You must test if the effects of this gift have been doubled.

comment_give_normal.dialog: You can throw any matter into the energy converter.

comment_give_special.dialog: This will generate a little extra power.

comment_give_favorite.dialog: This will generate a lot of power!

comment_give_I_energy_glyph.dialog: This Unit will be brave.|L||shake|This is only a drawing of her.|norm|

comment_give_TAG_astrayo_part.dialog: Where did you get that?|L||shake|Is SHE around here?|norm|

comment_give_quick.dialog: This Unit can convert anything into energy.

comment_give_blessing.dialog: Pure vibes are not the best source of power, but it can work.

comment_give_taken.dialog: It's not a good idea to convert something the device has already generated.

comment_give_starter.dialog: This Unit will not take this from you.

TAG_astrayo_part_given.dialog: This Unit knows where this came from.
|shake|This Unit is not designed to handle her energy levels.

leave_blank.dialog: Not if I leave this with you.
It will take hours to decrease this temperature.

leave_defect.dialog: What if we made a copy of Blue?
Scans indicate that this would require more energy than is available in the known universe.
It seems that the universe only has enough room for one perfect being.

leave_twins.dialog: Can you make some copies of my sister?
She has a lot of girlfriends and she needs to spend time with all of them.
The duplicator can't really be used for that.

leave_devil.dialog: Okay, now make me an evil twin!

leave_devil.dialog_rand1: Her broken wing would be on the other side.
leave_devil.dialog_rand2: Her hair would be purple instead.

leave_devil.dialog: And then I have to fight her.
|wave|Don't worry.|norm||L||!|There's no way she could defeat me, The Devil.
